issue.title: [Go] offset not used when accessing boolean array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4126](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4126). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When accessing a boolean array, the offset of the underlying data buffer is not used. This affects the behavior of slicing. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/3273> .
